ingredients.alim_nom_eng: Salt, white (sea, igneous or rock), iodine added, no other enrichment

ingredients_text: 61% trigo integral triturado, 39% arroz partido, azúcar, jarabe de azúcar moreno invertido, extracto de malta de cebada, sal, jarabe de glucosa.

carbohydrates.notes: Have sugar and fiber so ignore carbs
